summary: Growth and operations leader with a track record of scaling demand, building high-performing teams, and improving end-to-end customer journeys. I combine performance marketing, product thinking, and operational rigor to increase acquisition, conversion, and retention—while simplifying the systems and processes behind them. Recent work spans paid media, analytics, CRM/automation, and funnel optimization; prior leadership: marketing and patient experience/operations through rapid multi-state expansion.

experience.summary: Advise growth-stage companies on acquisition, marketing operations, and digital strategy; tailor playbooks to model and stage.
highlights: Partner with leadership to build teams and implement CRM/automation aligned to ops/finance.
Guide GTM, positioning, and channel mix to diversify acquisition and lift conversion/retention.
Develop KPI frameworks/dashboards to teach CAC/ROI/funnel measurement.

experience.summary: Owned day-to-day operations across multi-state care delivery; improved satisfaction, reduced no-shows, and scaled processes.
highlights: Oversaw 12,000+ monthly appointments across 80+ providers and six states.
Reduced no-show rates by 20% and increased NPS to 70 via process + comms improvements.
Implemented automation/reporting to streamline lead→appointment conversion and free capacity.
Led cross-functional teams to optimize scheduling, intake, and follow-up workflows.
Partnered with marketing/product to align capacity planning with demand generation.
Hired and managed a team of 40+ across patient experience, scheduling, and operations.
Instituted quarterly OKRs, performance reviews, and career development plans.

experience.summary: Built the marketing function and scaled acquisition during multi-state expansion; supported Seed→Series B.
highlights: Directed multi-channel growth with seven-figure paid budgets.
Launched GTM for new states/service lines; aligned with ops readiness.
Implemented CRM/automation; built performance dashboards for leadership.

experience.summary: Led digital strategy for a multi-location provider; increased patient volume via integrated paid + organic.
highlights: Drove ~40% patient-volume increase with integrated campaigns.
Launched SEO/UX-optimized site; materially lifted conversions/bookings.
Managed paid search/social; ~20% appointment lift while lowering CAC.

experience.summary: Produced product and brand content to support performance and lifecycle campaigns.
highlights: Shot/edited product and lifestyle assets for ads, email, and onsite use.
Collaborated with growth team to deliver fast creative iterations.

experience.summary: Supported membership growth and brand collateral across locations.
highlights: Designed print/digital materials for programs and promotions.
Assisted local teams with outreach and member onboarding.

experience.summary: Coordinated member services and local promotions to increase engagement.
highlights: Improved onboarding/check-in workflows for daily operations.
Partnered on community events to drive sign-ups.

experience.summary: Oversaw multi-site youth sports programming and operations.
highlights: Managed scheduling, staffing, and safety across locations.
Standardized volunteer training and league communications.

experience.summary: Coordinated youth sports leagues; improved parent/coach experience.
highlights: Introduced updated clinic formats and scheduling templates.
Led volunteer recruitment and game-day operations.
